name: part_005
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】A ZOMBIE IDOL'S DREAM COME TRUE？! #KureijiOllie3D [qk0HSjgN5LQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Kureiji Ollie performs her original song 'ZOM-BIE!!' on stage.
A transition screen showing the logo and credits before cutting to a different scene.
Ollie wakes up on the floor of a messy room with her limbs detached and proceeds to put herself back together.
Ollie receives a call from Ayunda Risu and Airani Iofifteen. They greet each other and chat about recent events.
Ollie, Risu, and Iofifteen start a game of charades where Ollie acts out themes for the others to guess.

subtitles.original: Hah?
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: Uuugh...
subtitles.english: Uuugh...

subtitles.original: Kayaknya Ollie barusan mimpi enak deh.
subtitles.english: I think I just had a wonderful dream.

subtitles.original: Habis jadi pro gamer gitu.
subtitles.english: I was like a pro gamer or something.

subtitles.original: Hah, ini tangan kaki pada... oh, di situ.
subtitles.english: Huh, my arms and legs are... oh, they're there.

subtitles.original: Tadi bisa copot gitu.
subtitles.english: They just came off like that.

subtitles.original: Oi, kaki! Kur kur kur kur kur kur kur kur kur...
subtitles.english: Hey, leg! [bird calling sounds]

subtitles.original: Good kaki, good kaki, good kaki.
subtitles.english: Good leg, good leg, good leg.

subtitles.original: Heh, ah, okay.
subtitles.english: Heh, ah, okay.

subtitles.original: Sekarang... uh, udah bisa.
subtitles.english: Now... uh, I can do it.

subtitles.original: Udah bisa berdiri. I can stand now.
subtitles.english: I can stand now. I can stand now.

subtitles.original: Now about my other arm... ah, there it is.
subtitles.english: Now about my other arm... ah, there it is.

subtitles.original: Heish! Sssh... tangan... back... issh!
subtitles.english: Heish! Sssh... arm... back... issh!

subtitles.original: Ha! Baru lagi! Seperti... baru lagi. Hehe.
subtitles.english: Ha! Good as new! Just like... brand new. Hehe.

subtitles.original:
Ah! It's because of that damn... dam...
I don't know what to call her.
subtitles.english:
Ah! It's because of that damn... dam...
I don't know what to call her.

subtitles.original: Ollie nggak tahu itu tadi harus bilang apa, dorobou tiba-tiba.
subtitles.english: Ollie didn't know what to say, a thief suddenly appeared.

subtitles.original: Mou, kono dorobou-neko-san!
subtitles.english: Geez, this thieving cat!

subtitles.original: Ma, mou inakunatta kara, daijoubu ka na?
subtitles.english: Well, she's gone now, so it should be fine, right?

subtitles.original: Udah nggak ada jadi seharusnya udah nggak apa-apa kan ya?
subtitles.english: She's not here anymore, so everything's okay now, right?

subtitles.original: Mou anshin-anshin.
subtitles.english: What a relief.

subtitles.original: Oh?
subtitles.english: Oh?

subtitles.original: Apa?
subtitles.english: What?

subtitles.original: Moshi-moshi?
subtitles.english: Hello?

subtitles.original: Ha-heng!
subtitles.english: Ha-heng!

subtitles.original: Ha-heng?
subtitles.english: Ha-heng?

subtitles.original: Ha-heng!
subtitles.english: Ha-heng!

subtitles.original: Ha... ha-heng?
subtitles.english: Ha... ha-heng?

subtitles.original: Jangan-jangan... ini!
subtitles.english: Don't tell me... it's this!

subtitles.original: Ha-heng!
subtitles.english: Ha-heng!

subtitles.original: Bisa bilang yang lain selain ha-heng nggak?
subtitles.english: Can you say something other than 'ha-heng'?

subtitles.original: Mualas!
subtitles.english: How annoying!

subtitles.original: Halo, selamat datang!
subtitles.english: Hello, welcome!

subtitles.original: Yeay, Ollie omedetou!
subtitles.english: Yay, congrats Ollie!

subtitles.original: Oke, silakan perkenalkan diri.
subtitles.english: Okay, please introduce yourselves.

subtitles.original: Halo, aku Ayunda Risu dari Hololive ID Generation 1.
subtitles.english: Hello, I'm Ayunda Risu from Hololive ID Generation 1.

subtitles.original: Yeay!
subtitles.english: Yeay!

subtitles.original: Kemudian ada Yopi!
subtitles.english: Next we have Yopi!

subtitles.original: Yopi-pi, Airani Iofifteen, hello!
subtitles.english: Yopi-pi, Airani Iofifteen, hello!

subtitles.original: Yeay, makasih udah dateng! Ollie seneng!
subtitles.english: Yay, thanks for coming! Ollie is so happy!

subtitles.original: Eh, Ollie nanti kamu jangan lihat Twitter ya.
subtitles.english: Eh, Ollie, don't check Twitter later, okay?

subtitles.original: Ada apa? Ada apa dengan Twitter?
subtitles.english: What's up? What's wrong with Twitter?

subtitles.original: Jangan lihat Twitter nggak apa-apa.
subtitles.english: Just don't check Twitter, it's okay.

subtitles.original: Jangan-jangan... jangan lihat Twitter kita berdua, jangan.
subtitles.english: Don't... don't look at our Twitters, don't.

subtitles.original: Oh, oh... begitu kah? Oh, oh, baiklah.
subtitles.english: Oh, oh... is that so? Oh, oh, alright.

subtitles.original: Oke, mumpung nih kalian di sini. While you guys are still here.
subtitles.english: Okay, since you guys are here. While you guys are still here.

subtitles.original: Enaknya kita main nggak sih? I think it's fun if we play.
subtitles.english: Wouldn't it be fun if we played something? I think it's fun if we play.

subtitles.original: Boleh! Ayo, gas! Mari!
subtitles.english: Sure! Let's go! Come on!

subtitles.original: Tapi jangan yang susah-susah ya, Ollie takut, ID satu tidak boleh berkata kasar.
subtitles.english: But nothing too hard, Ollie's scared, Gen 1 shouldn't use harsh words.

subtitles.original: Ya, kalau gitu, mari kita main tebak-tebakan... let's play some charades.
subtitles.english: In that case, let's play a guessing game... let's play some charades.

subtitles.original: Jadi rulesnya simpel ya. Ollie akan memperagakan sesuatu, kalian harus menebak.
subtitles.english: The rules are simple. Ollie will act something out and you have to guess.

subtitles.original: Apabila benar, kalian boleh ngerikues apa pun dari Ollie.
subtitles.english: If you get it right, you can request anything from Ollie.

subtitles.original: Oke, apa pun? Apa pun? Eh, aku mikirin apa nih? Apa pun?
subtitles.english: Okay, anything? Anything? Eh, what should I think of? Anything?

subtitles.original: Apa kamu yakin bisa, Yopi? Aku nih temen-temen...
subtitles.english: Are you sure you can do it, Yopi? Me, friends...

subtitles.original: Apa pun! Ini, ini itu kan... gara-gara Risu-senpai di chat pada nulis 'malas' semua 'malas'.
subtitles.english: Anything! This is... because of Risu-senpai, everyone in chat is writing 'lazy'.

subtitles.original: Ya udah, jangan malas-malas lagi kalau gitu! Ayo semangat!
subtitles.english: Well then, don't be lazy anymore! Let's get pumped!

subtitles.original: Nggak boleh! Nggak boleh malas!
subtitles.english: No way! You can't be lazy!

subtitles.original: Kalau gitu, kita langsung masuk ke pertanyaan per... pertama kalian.
subtitles.english: In that case, let's go straight to your very first question.

subtitles.original: Oke, kalau gitu, pertanyaan pertama! Eto... sato!
subtitles.english: Okay then, first question! Uh... one!

subtitles.original: Ninja! Ninja! Issh! He-e!
subtitles.english: Ninja! Ninja! Issh! He-e!

subtitles.original: Mudah ya? Issh! He-e! Terlalu mudah.
subtitles.english: Easy, right? Issh! He-e! Too easy.

subtitles.original:
Theme: Ninja
忍者
subtitles.english:
Theme: Ninja
Ninja

subtitles.original: Harusnya aku yang jawab. Hehe, anda kalah cepat. Ya ampun.
subtitles.english: I should've answered. Hehe, you weren't fast enough. Oh my god.

subtitles.original: Kalau gitu, apakah ada... oh tunggu sebentar.
subtitles.english: In that case, is there... oh wait a second.

subtitles.original: Ini mumpung nih, mumpung banget. Kayaknya kalau Ollie berpose pakai sesuatu yang keren, keren juga nggak sih?
subtitles.english: Since we're here, it's a great opportunity. Wouldn't it be cool if Ollie posed with something cool?

subtitles.original: Boleh! Tunggu, Ollie ambil pistol dulu ya.
subtitles.english: Sure! Wait, Ollie will get the gun first.

subtitles.original: Oke! Ah, buat melawan ini tadi, apa... dorobou.
subtitles.english: Okay! Ah, to fight this earlier, what was it... the thief.

subtitles.original: Dia, si 'Doro-Zombie'.
subtitles.english: Her, the 'Thief-Zombie'.

subtitles.original: Keren kan? Berpose pakai ini kali ya.
subtitles.english: Cool, right? I'll pose with this.

subtitles.original: Ets! Boleh, boleh. Kalau gitu, Yopi ada rikues nggak?
subtitles.english: Hey! Sure, sure. In that case, Yopi do you have a request?

subtitles.original: Ah, ini... kamu jalan ke belakang terus kayak ke samping gitu lho. Ngerti nggak?
subtitles.english: Ah, this... you walk to the back and then go to the side like that. Get it?

subtitles.original: Kamu jalan ke belakang terus langsung kayak balikin badan ke sini gitu lho. Kayak pose habis nembak gitu lho.
subtitles.english: You walk to the back and then immediately turn around to here. Like a post-shooting pose.

subtitles.original: Kalau gitu... na na na! Satu, dua, tiga... PLING! Ck-ya!
subtitles.english: In that case... [singing]! One, two, three... [SFX]! Ck-ya!

subtitles.original: Gitu kah? Ck-ya! Tembak hatiku kakak!
subtitles.english: Like that? Ck-ya! Shoot my heart, big sister!

subtitles.original: Jedarr! Jedarr! Jedarr! Woi! Bah keren sudah.
subtitles.english: Bang! Bang! Bang! Hey! Wow, that's cool.

subtitles.original: Kalau gitu berikutnya Ollie juga bakal pakai ini kali ya.
subtitles.english: In that case, next Ollie will probably use this too.

subtitles.original: Oke, kalau gitu kita langsung ke... pertanyaan kedua. Eto... sato!
subtitles.english: Okay then, let's go straight to... the second question. Uh... one!

subtitles.original: Oh? Uh? Apa tuh?
subtitles.english: Oh? Uh? What's that?

subtitles.original: Melihat! Melihat! Bukan, bukan.
subtitles.english: Looking! Looking! No, no.

subtitles.original: Kecil... an-ya? Petting... Robo?
subtitles.english: Small... ? Petting... Robo?

subtitles.original: Ah, mengelus kepala.
subtitles.english: Ah, headpatting.
